official_title: A bill to provide for the addition of Colonial Germantown in the city of Philadelphia, State of Pennsylvania to Independence National Historical Park.

summary.text: Provides for the addition of Colonial Germantown in the city of Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, to Independence National Historical Park.
